WorkItem.Description:
Basically, when app is under heavy load and navigation occurs, get COM exception on RaiseCanExecuteChanged().

Described the issue here, http://stackoverflow.com/questions/32617189/raisecanexecutechanged-com-exception-during-navigation

Reproduced issue here, https://github.com/subt13/BugSamples

(latest mvvmlight ver)

Comments.Message: Sometimes FatalExecutionEngineError (with v5.3.0 of MVVMLight and Windows Store App)
